sentences.en: ...the man who had subjected her to four years of beatings and abuse.
sentences.cn: …那个使她遭受了4年殴打和辱骂的男人。

sentences.en: All flights are subject to delay.
sentences.cn: 所有航班都有可能延误。

sentences.en: All through lunch he had carefully avoided the subject of the house.
sentences.cn: 整个午饭期间，他一直在小心翼翼地回避房子的话题。

sentences.en: Eventually I broached the subject of her early life.
sentences.cn: 最后我提到了关于她的早年生活的话题。

sentences.en: Her poems are modishly experi-mental in style and recondite in subject-matter.
sentences.cn: 她的诗在风格上是时髦的实验派，主题艰深难懂。

sentences.en: I think we'd better leave the subject of Nationalism.
sentences.cn: 我看我们最好还是搁下民族主义这个话题吧。

sentences.en: I wanted to spare Frances the embarrassment of discussing this subject.
sentences.cn: 讨论这个话题太尴尬，我不想让弗朗西斯难堪。

sentences.en: In the car she reverted to the subject uppermost in her mind.
sentences.cn: 在车里，她又提起了她最关心的话题。

sentences.en: It specifically referenced Hermann Noordung's classic 1928 book on this subject.
sentences.cn: 在这一问题上它特别参照了赫尔曼·诺丁1928年的经典之作。

sentences.en: Let's keep to the subject, or you'll get me too confused.
sentences.cn: 别跑题，否则你会把我搞糊涂的。

sentences.en: Mullins knocked me off-balance with his abrupt change of subject.
sentences.cn: 马林斯突然改变话题，这让我措手不及。

sentences.en: My favourite subject is math.
sentences.cn: 我最喜欢的学科是数学。

sentences.en: My favourite subject is math.
sentences.cn: 被他国统治的民族

sentences.en: Paul has strong opinions on most subjects.
sentences.cn: 保罗在大多数问题上观点激烈。

sentences.en: Prices are subject to change .
sentences.cn: 价格有可能变化。

sentences.en: Prices may be subject to alteration.
sentences.cn: 价格可能会受变更影响。

sentences.en: Sensing she was on shaky ground, Marie changed the subject.
sentences.cn: 感到自己的观点站不住脚，玛丽于是换了个话题。

sentences.en: The drama takes an idealistic, even a naive view of the subject.
sentences.cn: 这部戏在对待这一主题上有些理想化，甚至是天真。

sentences.en: The empirical evidence considered here is subject to many qualifications.
sentences.cn: 此处提及的实验证据有诸多限制条件。

sentences.en: The Roman Empire subjected most of Europe to its rule.
sentences.cn: 罗马帝国把欧洲多数地区置于自己的统治之下。

sentences.en: The subject came up during a pre-dinner drink with our guests.
sentences.cn: 在与客人喝餐前酒的时候，有人提到了这个话题。

sentences.en: The subject of the talk is announced a week in advance.
sentences.cn: 会谈的主题已提前一周宣布。

sentences.en: The subjects covered in this chapter are exercise and nutrition.
sentences.cn: 本章涵盖的主题是运动和营养。

sentences.en: The tribunal is unique because Mr. Jones is not subject to the normal police discipline code.
sentences.cn: 这个审判很特别，因为琼斯先生不受一般的警务纪律约束。

sentences.en: Their epic fight is the subject of a new film.
sentences.cn: 他们史诗般的战斗是一部新电影的主题。

words.tran_cn: 服从的；易患…的；受制于…的

phrases.tran_cn: 主题区，主题范围；职务范围
标题；主题行；主题栏；事由

trans.tran_en: To be subject to something means to be affected by it or to be likely to be affected by it
the thing you are talking about or considering in a conversation, discussion, book, film etc
to force a country or group of people to be ruled by you, and control them very strictly
to force a country or group of people to be ruled by you, and control them very strictly
